thread.title: IRGC: Iran is ready for war at any level
thread.title_full: IRGC: Iran is ready for war at any level

author: apa.az
title: IRGC: Iran is ready for war at any level
text:
IRGC: Iran is ready for war at any level © APA | Commander-in-Chief of the Islamic Revolution Guard Corps, Major General Hossein Salami
12 June 2025 11:29 (UTC +04:00) Commander-in-Chief of the Islamic Revolution Guard Corps, Major General Hossein Salami, says the IRGC defense equipment has seen remarkable advancement and it's fully prepared to respond to any threat, APA reports citing Mehr News Agency.
Hossein Salami visited the operational units of the IRGC Navy's First Naval Zone on Wednesday.
During the visit, he emphasized the strategic significance of the Persian Gulf and its surrounding areas in Iran’s defense doctrine.
He stated that the IRGC Navy is capable of engaging in close-range naval battles and managing long-range maritime warfare. He highlighted the notable expansion of the Navy’s fast-attack boats and the “astonishing development” of its missile and drone capabilities.
“We are fully prepared to respond to any threat scenario,” Salami asserted.
